code: import axios from"axios";import{LOGIN_USER,REGISTER_USER}from"./types";export function loginUser(dataToSubmit){var request=axios.post("/api/users/login",dataToSubmit).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:request};}export function registerUser(dataToSubmit){var request=axios.post("/api/users/register",dataToSubmit).then(function(response){return response.data;});return{type:REGISTER_USER,payload:request};}
